Guide to racism in modern America

http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#lab.@value: This book explores how the US criminal justice system perpetuates inequality, from the police's origins as slave patrols to the school-to-prison pipeline. The United States has the highest incarceration rate in the world, and there is great racial inequality in the criminal justice system
